thread.section_title: FlorPassion Flowers Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per FlorPassion Flowers | fiorionlinemilano.it
thread.title: alan11
thread.title_full: FlorPassion Flowers recensione scritta da alan11

author: alan11
title: alan11
text: Laura at FlorPassion Flowers helped me every step of the way in placing my order. She offered fantastic advice on the arrangements and cheerily answered my many questions via chat. After I placed the order, I realized that it was to be delivered on the wrong date and she offered alternative dates which was of great help. She ensured that the flowers when the recipient was home as well. The flowers were very well received!
